languages.text: "Решением губернатора Драйвстема виновные были казнены. Все, до единого". {n}Голос Абеляра хрипит, каждое слово дается ему с большим трудом.{/n} "Уверяю, случившееся произошло за моей спиной, и стало для меня настоящим ударом. Сейчас порядок на Даргонусе полностью восстановлен, и это единственное, что имеет значение".

traits.locale_text: "Решением губернатора Драйвстема виновные были казнены. Все, до единого". {n}Голос Абеляра хрипит, каждое слово дается ему с большим трудом.{/n} "Уверяю, случившееся произошло за моей спиной, и стало для меня настоящим ударом. Сейчас порядок на Даргонусе полностью восстановлен, и это единственное, что имеет значение".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

Сейчас порядок на Даргонусе полностью восстановлен, и это единственное, что имеет значение".

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “总督已经处决了所有涉及叛乱的成员，一个活口都没留。”{n}阿贝拉德的声音沙哑，说话非常吃力。{/n}“我向您保证，这些事情我完全不知情，对我来说也是个巨大的打击。不过，现在达戈努斯已经恢复了秩序，这才是最要紧的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

traits.locale_text: “总督已经处决了所有涉及叛乱的成员，一个活口都没留。”{n}阿贝拉德的声音沙哑，说话非常吃力。{/n}“我向您保证，这些事情我完全不知道，对我来说也是个巨大的打击。不过，现在达戈努斯已经恢复了秩序，这才是最要紧的事情。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Gouverneur Drivestem hat die Täter hinrichten lassen. Allesamt." {n}Abelards Stimme krächzt fürchterlich. Er hat Mühe, überhaupt zu sprechen.{/n} "Ich versichere Euch, dass diese Ereignisse ohne mein Wissen geschehen sind und mich wirklich schockiert haben. Die Ordnung in Dargonus ist inzwischen vollständig wiederhergestellt, und nur das zählt."
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Drivestem hat die Täter hinrichten lassen. Allesamt." {n}Abelards Stimme krächzt fürchterlich. Er hat Mühe, überhaupt zu sprechen.{/n} "Ich versichere Euch, dass diese Ereignisse hinter meinem Rücken geschehen sind und mich wirklich schockiert haben. Die Ordnung in Dargonus ist inzwischen vollständig wiederhergestellt, und nur das zählt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «El gobernador Drivestem mandó ejecutar a los responsables. A todos y cada uno de ellos». {n}La voz de Abelard se quiebra. Le cuesta seguir hablando.{/n} «Le garantizo que esas fechorías se cometieron sin mi conocimiento y me hallo tan sorprendido como usted. Pero ya se ha restablecido el orden en Dargonus, que es lo único que importa».
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

traits.locale_text: «El gobernador Drivestem mandó ejecutar a los responsables. A todos y cada uno de ellos». {n}La voz de Abelard se quiebra. Le cuesta seguir hablando.{/n} «Le garantizo que esas fechorías se cometieron a mis espaldas y me hallo tan sorprendido como usted. Pero ya se ha restablecido el orden en Dargonus, que es lo único que importa».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Le gouverneur Drivestem a fait exécuter tous les coupables, jusqu'au dernier. » {n}La voix d'Abélard se fait plus rauque, comme s'il avait du mal à parler.{/n} « Je vous l'assure, je n'avais pas connaissance de ces événements qui m'ont véritablement choqué. Quoi qu'il en soit, l'ordre a été rétabli sur Dargonus et c'est tout ce qui compte. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur Drivestem a fait exécuter les coupables, jusqu'au dernier. » {n}La voix d'Abélard se fait plus rauque, comme s'il avait du mal à parler.{/n} « Je vous l'assure, je n'avais pas connaissance de ces événements qui m'ont véritablement choqué. Quoi qu'il en soit, l'ordre a été rétabli sur Dargonus et c'est tout ce qui compte. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ドライブステン総督は犯人を処刑させました。一人残らず」{n}アベラルドの声はかすれている。彼は何とか話そうと苦戦している。{/n}「はっきり申し上げますと、あの出来事は私の預かり知らぬところで起きたことで、私にとっては本当にショックな出来事でした。ダルゴナスは今、完全に秩序を取り戻しました。それが何よりも重要です。」
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステン総督は犯人を処刑させました。一人残らず」{n}アベラルドの声はかすれている。彼は何とか話そうと苦戦している。{/n}「はっきり申し上げますと、あの出来事は私の預かり知らぬところで起きたことで、私にとっては本当にショックな出来事でした。ダルゴナスは今、完全に秩序を取り戻しました。それが何よりも重要です。」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem, faillerin idamına karar verdi. Her birinin." {n}Sesi hırıltılı çıkan Abelard, konuşmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "Tüm bu olaylar, benim haberim olmadan gerçekleşti ve beni de büyük bir şoka uğrattı. Dargonus'ta düzen yeniden sağlandı, önemli olan da bu."
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem had the perpetrators executed. Every last one of them." {n}Abelard's voice is raspy. He is struggling to speak.{/n} "I assure you those events happened without my knowledge and came as a genuine shock to me. Dargonus has been fully restored to order now, which is all that matters."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem, faillerin idamına karar verdi. Her birinin." {n}Abelard'ın sesi hırıltılı bir şekilde çıkıyor, konuşmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "Tüm bu olaylar, benim haberim olmadan gerçekleşti ve beni de büyük bir şoka uğrattı. Dargonus'ta düzen yeniden sağlandı, önemli olan da bu."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
